title: Campus Hackathon 2025
description: A 24-hour hackathon where student teams collaborate intensively to build innovative solutions, solve real-world problems, and showcase their creativity, coding skills, and teamwork to a panel of judges.

title: Career Fair 2025
description: Meet top employers, explore internships and job opportunities, attend resume workshops, and receive guidance on networking, interviews, and career planning to advance your professional development.

title: Startup Pitch Night
description: Pitch your innovative startup ideas to industry experts and investors, receive valuable feedback, network with like-minded entrepreneurs, and gain exposure in a dynamic and engaging environment.

title: Wellness Workshop
description: Participate in a mindfulness and wellness workshop designed to reduce stress, improve mental health, and maintain balance through guided exercises, interactive discussions, and relaxation techniques.

title: International Food Festival
description: Celebrate global culinary diversity with student chefs preparing dishes from around the world, enjoy tastings, cooking demonstrations, and cultural performances celebrating food and community.

title: Spring Music Concert
description: Enjoy an evening of live music performances by student bands and solo artists, showcasing diverse styles and talents in a vibrant and entertaining concert experience for all attendees.

title: Sustainability Summit
description: Learn about sustainable living, climate action, and environmental solutions through engaging talks, interactive workshops, and networking with experts and advocates for a greener future.

title: Photography Exhibition Opening
description: Explore the creative works of student photographers as they showcase images that reflect identity, culture, and perspective, accompanied by artist talks and interactive engagement.

title: AI & Machine Learning Symposium
description: Industry experts present the latest trends in AI and machine learning, with hands-on workshops, interactive sessions, and discussions on research, applications, and innovations transforming technology today.
